All eyes will be on the House tomorrow night. In what I believe to be a high-risk strategy, the president may finally spell out HIS vision.

Just as many in favor as opposed.
Participatory democracy is alive and well in the US. Now the next chapter will be written. It remains to be seen if members have listened.
